org.efaps.beans

Class ValueList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.beans.ValueList

  • public class ValueList
extends Object
    This class work together with the generated classes of the kernel (org.efpas.beans.valueparser) to get the Values for a String expression defined as a DBProperty like: "$< Type> '$< Name>': Details" from the eFaps-DataBase. The Values for an expression ("$< Type>") retrieved from the eFaps-DataBase will be combined with pure Text ("Details").
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

      • makeString

        public String makeString(Instance _callInstance,
                AbstractPrintQuery _print,
                AbstractUserInterfaceObject.TargetMode _mode)
                  throws EFapsException
        This method retrieves the Values from the given PrintQuery and combines them with the Text partes.
        Parameters:
        _callInstance - instance on which the query was called
        _print - AbstractPrintQuery the ValueString should be retrieved
        _mode - target mode
        Returns:
        String with the actuall Value of this ValueList
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        #makeSelect(AbstractQuery)}
